main event: Six small objects were observed in the sky moving at high speed in Hollywood, California on April 7, 1955.
interesting points: The objects were described as the size of peas and were observed for approximately 5 seconds., The objects moved in a trail and changed direction quickly before disappearing., A second object joined the group during the sighting., The sighting occurred under clear skies with good visibility., There was insufficient data for further investigation due to the brevity of the observation.
sighted object: six small high-speed objects in the sky
witness description: A witness from Stevens Studio who reported the observation over the phone.
